entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
